page.title: 16All Saints' Church-W.Lough.
page.content: All Saints' Church is the{Parish Church for{Thorpe Acre}and{Dishley}and was consecrated in{1845.}A new vicar, {Dr. Collin Green,}was inducted in May 1984. There are two{Communion}services and an{Evensong}every Sunday. The Parish has an active community with {house groups}to increase peoples' understanding, faith and fellowship. There are 4 Sunday School groups - the {Scramblers}(3-5 yrs.),{Climbers}(6-7 yrs.),{Explorers}(8-10 yrs.) and {Pathfinders }(11-14 yrs.). There are also{Youth clubs}for the 15-20 year olds, an active{Mothers' Union}and a {Mums and Toddlers}group. Volunteers visit the elderly and counsel parishioners who have problems. Due to the increase in the local population, a major extension to the Church will soon be built.
